title: What questions should I ask to a career counselor? - Quora

response.answer_text: You should visit a career counselor and discuss in detail about your confusion and current plans, analyse it along with them and come to a conclusion for selecting the right career path. You can interact with CareerPotli for the same, one of the best career counselors I have ever interacted with and the most effective one to have counseled over 65,000 students across the country and having 150 plus counselors onboard with them for effectively counseling the students and professionals. Their career assessment test will analyse your core strengths, skills, interest areas, capabilities and then suggest you a career path accordingly. Also, during the one to one interaction session with the experts, you can clear all your doubts, queries, confusions, ask questions related to your higher education and career directly from the experts and get expert advice and guidance for selecting the most suitable career path for you with assured results and a successful career ahead. I will strongly suggest you to visit them once for the best career decision making.

Look for options in your area/s of interest. Say you want to do something with plants…ask all the possible options available from becoming a botanist (researcher) to doing a business in recycling flowers and making new products out of them, or setting up a nursery or horticulture etc, teaching, gardening, maintaining plants for organizations or whatever else is possible. Just look at all options in a particular line of work. But you have to know your own interests of course. And if you do not know your interest/aptitude- let them help you identify that firstly.
